Text.Page:
That big ship out there, the Batia's Hulk, was a gula merchant ship. The undead sailors you see everywhere were her hands.

Help the drowned gula {@LinkCreature:31#12#sailors}, {@LinkCreature:31#13#swabs}, {@LinkCreature:31#14#bosuns}, and {@LinkCreature:31#15#officers} to their final reward, and see if you can find any information about their shipwreck.

Talk to Leuwra when you've finished.
Thanks for your efforts. I'll examine this bosun's diary. Maybe it will contain information about the shipwreck.
We may be able to gain some valuable information from the pieces of the bosun's diary. Please bring me more.
